analysis.Summary: Vue SFC that renders a calendar SVG icon with configurable fill color and accepts arbitrary CSS classes via $attrs.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable calendar icon component throughout the application, allowing customization of its fill color and CSS classes.

Components.name: IconCalendar
Components.role: renders an SVG calendar icon; accepts props for fill color and ordering (order prop is defined but not used in template); forwards arbitrary attributes/classes via $attrs.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: defines component props `fill` (String, default 'rgb(var(--black))') and `order` (String, default 'desc') in the <script setup> context

Dependencies: CSS variable `--black` for default fill color
analysis.Usage: Imported as `import IconCalendar from '@/modules/icons/entities/IconCalendar.vue'` and used in templates as `<IconCalendar :fill="'#ff0000'" class="my-icon"/>`.
Notes: The `order` prop is declared but not currently used in the template or logic.
All CSS classes passed via the `class` attribute are forwarded to the `<path>` element through `$attrs.class`.
A local style `.icon-custom` is defined but not referenced in the template.
SVG dimensions are hardcoded (width=16, height=15) and viewBox is set accordingly.
